content.title: OneDigit, a fintech startup for creators by IITKGP Alumni
content.subtitle: Platform design & Full-stack development
content: Working closely with the CTO, to implement the fintech product OneDigit that caters to freelancers, creators and consultants

content.title: Soil Logics LLC, Stanford University
content.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
content: Developed the company’s USP product from scratch - real time web app for geospatial analysis and visualization of soil health
Explored and implemented map visualization APIs from major geospatial frameworks like Mapbox and Google Maps
Built the frontend on VueJS using various Vue libraries to deploy the GIS application with more than 5 different map applications & views
Added functionality of Temporal analysis for analysing soil health over time - was awarded with a bonus for the same

content.title: India COVID Support
content.subtitle: Project Technical Lead
content: Developed a progressive web application with VueJS frontend and MongoDB-Node-Express backend in just 48 hours
Co-developed a Twitter Tweet Scraper in Python which used NLP to process the tweets and autoreplied with data from the backend
Featured on National Television, India COVID Support had a daily active user count to a maximum of 65000
Maintained the React based web application, Covid Verified – parallelly developed by the Alumni of IIT Bombay who were preparing for the upcoming third wave

content.title: Employee Performance Feedback Mechanism
content.subtitle: IIT Kanpur Summer of Code, Medallion Social Innovators, Bangalore
content: Led a 5-membered team and developed a Real time web application using HTML, CSS and JS & deployed on Firebase for task management and score based employee performance feedback management system using a unique system of weighted 40-point ACTION score as specified to be used for assessment in the health centers of Medallion Social Innovators

content.title: KanopyTech Solutions
content.subtitle: Python Tkinter UI Developer
content: Developed the User Interface for the company’s electrolysis processing codes integrating their existing Python code with Tkinter

content.title: Goldcast LLC, Harvard University
content.subtitle: Frontend Development Intern
content: Developed the company’s Landing Page using JavaScript, HTML and CSS

content.title: Startup Incubation and Innovation Center
content.subtitle: Strategy, Outreach and Tech Internship
content: Reported directly to VP Strategy (then Head, Strategy),
Worked in the core team of the following projects like Kolhapur Startup Mission, Abhivyakti 2019
Managed a team of 2-6 first and second year interns to build strategic marketing and outreach content
Built and maintained the SIIC and all its websites, and email services

mainContent.title: Miscellaneous - Extra Curricular Activities
content: Mathematics - As a mathematics enthusiast, participated and represented IIT Kanpur and City Montessori School in various competitions of pre-college and college level Mathematics. Scored 113/122 in JEE Advanced 2017

Graphic and User Interface Design - Designed various logos, brandings and advertisements for various startups and clubs at IIT Kanpur. Represented IIT Kanpur in Inter IIT Cultural Meet twice bagging 4th and 6th positions in rebranding and User Interface Design in 2019
Logic, Aptitude and Mental Ability - Have participated and won various competitions and events in the same - Resonance Smart Kid Runner Up, NTSE Level 1 Scholar and many more achievements
2nd Runner Up, Naveen Wal District Chess Championship, Lucknow

content.title: 3D Reconstruction on Scenes and Structures
content.subtitle: Undergraduate Project 1, IIT Kanpur (awarded A) Summer 2018
content: Developed a Camera Calibration and Feature Matching web-app for Sparse and Dense 3D Reconstruction of Scenes and Structures as a first attempt to learning Photogrammetry and Computer Vision

content.title: Program Package for Positioning & Navigation using NavIC IIT Kanpur
content.subtitle: Undergraduate Project 2, IIT Kanpur (awarded A) Fall 2019
content: Developing a post processing Python program for navigation and positioning solely using the NavIC satellites developed by Indian Space Research Organisation using the code based solution and plan to extend to carrier-phase

content.title: Point Cloud to 3D Map of IIT Kanpur

Overall Runner Up (Gold + Silver + Silver + Bronze), International Young Mathematicians Convention (IYMC 2014) & Silver Medalist in IYMC 2012
